item.title: 新堡垒能源公司因波多黎各液化天然气交易重启而获得支持
item.description: 波多黎各总督周二证实，亿万富翁韦斯-爱登斯（Wes Edens）的新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy Inc.【原文：Billionaire Wes Edens’ New Fortress Energy Inc. has finalized a seven-year deal worth $4 billion to supply liquefied natural gas to Puerto Rico, the governor confirmed on Tuesday, giving the financially-strained company a shot in the arm.】

item.title: 关税冲击就业市场，加拿大央行将降息：决策指南
item.description: 在越来越多的证据表明美国关税正在损害经济和劳动力市场的情况下，加拿大央行很可能在周三恢复降息。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to resume cutting interest rates on Wednesday amid mounting evidence US tariffs are damaging the economy and labor market.】

item.title: 弗里兰将离开卡尼内阁，担任乌克兰特别职务
item.description: 克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）将离开内阁的运输和国内贸易部长职位，成为加拿大新任乌克兰重建特别代表。【原文：Chrystia Freeland is leaving her cabinet post as transport and internal trade minister to become Canada’s new special representative for the reconstruction of Ukraine.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 的鲁布纳认为股市在短暂震荡后将反弹
item.description: Citadel 证券公司的斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）认为，美股在创下新纪录的反弹可能会在未来几周经历动荡，然后以繁荣的姿态结束今年。【原文：A rally that has taken US stocks to fresh records could experience turbulence in coming weeks before finishing the year with a flourish, according to Citadel Securities’ Scott Rubner.】

item.title: 当局在与俄罗斯黄金有关的调查中突袭瑞士交易商
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞士当局上周四突袭了金属交易商 Open Mineral AG 的当地办事处，作为对其俄罗斯黄金交易可能违反制裁的调查的一部分。【原文：Swiss authorities raided the local office of metals trader Open Mineral AG last Thursday as part of an investigation into potential sanctions breaches relating to its trading in Russian gold, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Binance 即将达成协议，摆脱司法部的合规监管
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，全球最大的加密货币交易所 Binance Holdings Ltd. 正在与美国司法部达成一项潜在协议，允许其在 43 亿美元的和解协议中放弃一项关键的监督要求，该和解协议指控 Binance 在防止洗钱方面做得不够。【原文：Binance Holdings Ltd., the world’s largest crypto exchange, is moving toward a potential deal with the US Justice Department that would allow it to drop a key oversight requirement in its $4.3 billion settlement of allegations that it didn’t do enough to prevent money laundering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Pimco 称美联储 "抵押贷款扭转操作 "将促进住房市场发展
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：The Federal Reserve may be poised to resume interest-rate cuts this week, but it could do more to ease US mortgage costs and stimulate housing by using different tools involving its balance sheet, says Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 新西兰经济将出现萎缩，有理由进一步降低利率
item.description: 由于支出和投资萎缩，新西兰第二季度的经济可能出现萎缩，这证明储备银行进一步降息的预测是正确的。【原文：New Zealand’s economy probably contracted in the second quarter as spending and investment dried up, justifying the Reserve Bank’s projections of further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 私募股权基金向倒闭的问题企业投入数十亿美元：S&P
item.description: 据S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）称，私募股权公司正加倍向陷入困境的公司投入资金，但其中只有少数公司的信用质量得到了有意义或持久的改善。【原文：Private equity firms are doubling down on pouring funds into struggling companies but only a handful of them see meaningful or lasting improvement in their credit quality, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: Dye & Durham 股价下挫，申报延迟威胁扭亏为盈
item.description: 法律软件供应商 Dye & Durham 表示将错过提交年度报告的最后期限，导致该公司股价暴跌，为这家今年已经面临激进股东压力的公司又增添了一道障碍。【原文：Dye & Durham’s shares plunged after the legal software provider said it will miss the deadline for submitting its annual report, adding another hurdle for a company that has already faced pressure from an activist shareholder this year.】

item.title: 穆迪因债务指标和业绩不佳下调英力士评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将英力士集团控股公司（Ineos Group Holdings SA）的信用评级下调至高度投机水平，理由是这家石化产品制造商的经营业绩不断恶化，债务指标疲软。【原文：Moody’s Ratings cut Ineos Group Holdings SA’s credit score into highly-speculative territory, citing the petrochemical manufacturer’s deteriorating operating performance and weak debt metrics.】

item.title: HPS 和 Blue Owl 为 GTCR 的 SimpliSafe 收购案提供私人贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，HPS Investment Partners 和 Blue Owl Capital Inc. 是为支持 GTCR 收购住宅安全公司 SimpliSafe 而提供私人信贷方案的贷款方之一。【原文：HPS Investment Partners and Blue Owl Capital Inc. are among lenders providing a private credit package to support GTCR’s acquisition of residential security company SimpliSafe, according to people with knowledge of the deal.】

item.title: 英国议员质疑斯塔默对曼德尔森的决定
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）任命彼得-曼德尔森（Peter Mandelson）为英国驻华盛顿大使的判断遭到了来自各主要党派的议员们长达数小时的议会质询。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s judgment in appointing Peter Mandelson as the UK ambassador to Washington was called into question by lawmakers from all major parties in an hours-long parliamentary grilling.】

item.title: 微软首席执行官支持的 Groww 在印度公开提交首次公开募股申请
item.description: 印度最大的投资平台 Groww 的母公司 Billionbrains Garage Ventures Ltd. 周二在孟买提交了首次公开募股申请，其中包括通过新股募集多达 106 亿卢比（1.2 亿美元）资金的提议。【原文：Billionbrains Garage Ventures Ltd., the parent of India’s largest investment platform Groww, on Tuesday filed for an initial public offering in Mumbai that includes a proposal to raise as much as 10.6 billion rupees ($120 million) via new shares.】

item.title: 埃斯克里瓦表示，由于不确定性持续存在，欧洲央行必须保持灵活性
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose luis Escriva）说，尽管通胀已得到控制，但不确定性依然存在，欧洲中央银行必须随时准备在利率问题上采取行动。【原文：The European Central Bank must stand ready to act on interest rates, with uncertainty persisting despite inflation being under control, Governing Council member Jose luis Escriva said.】

item.title: 生物燃料需求受关注，豆油连续第五天上涨
item.description: 豆油期货连续第五天上涨，因为交易商在等待美国环境保护局提供的生物燃料掺混数据。【原文：Soybean oil futures gained for a fifth day as traders awaited biofuel blending figures from the US Environmental Protection Agency.】

item.title: 部长表示，英格鲁和泰克需要证明合并能为加拿大带来更多利益
item.description: 加拿大工业部长表示，英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）和泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）还没有做出足够的努力来展示其合并给加拿大经济带来的好处。【原文：Anglo American Plc and Teck Resources Ltd. haven’t done enough yet to show the advantages of their merger to the Canadian economy, said the country’s industry minister, who’s planning to meet with the companies’ chief executive officers next week.】

item.title: 政府要求注资后，瑞士联合银行对瑞士而言是否过于庞大？
item.description: 瑞士联合银行集团和瑞士在如何让一个财政资源有限的富裕小国成为世界最大银行之一的东道国的问题上争执不下。【原文：UBS Group AG and Switzerland are at loggerheads as they spar over how a rich but small country with limited fiscal resources should host one of the world’s largest banks.】

item.title: 阿根廷资产在米莱伊采取更温和立场后反弹
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在介绍下一年度预算时采取了更加温和的基调，提高了他在下月中期选举前获得支持的希望，阿根廷的美元债券和货币正在从长达一周的溃败中恢复过来。【原文：Argentina’s dollar bonds and currency are recovering from a week-long rout after President Javier Milei struck a more conciliatory tone during the introduction of next year’s budget, raising hopes he can gain support ahead of midterm elections next month.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 MGX 公司加入银湖公司收购英特尔 Altera 公司的交易
item.description: 由阿布扎比支持的专注于人工智能的投资公司 MGX 与私募股权公司 Silver Lake Management LLC 共同收购了英特尔公司旗下生产可编程芯片的 Altera 公司 51%的股份。【原文：MGX, an Abu Dhabi-backed investment company focused on artificial intelligence, joined private equity firm Silver Lake Management LLC in a 51% acquisition of Intel Corp.’s Altera, which makes programmable chips.】

item.title: 阿尼科首席执行官称未考虑竞购泰克资源公司
item.description: 据 Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. 首席执行官称，该公司并未考虑收购 Teck Resources Ltd. 。【原文：Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. isn’t considering buying Teck Resources Ltd., according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 汉莎航空任命泰森为下任董事长，克雷下台
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）表示，已指定约翰内斯-泰森（Johannes Teyssen）接替卡尔-路德维格-克莱（Karl-Ludwig Kley）担任下一任董事长。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG said it has designated Johannes Teyssen as its next chairman to succeed Karl-Ludwig Kley, who oversaw Europe’s largest aviation group for almost a decade, including the period of debilitating pandemic and an expansion into regional carriers.】

item.title: 思考富人的作用
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔 Solstice 部门将在分拆前融资 20 亿美元
item.description: 霍尼韦尔国际公司（Honeywell International Inc.【原文：The specialty-materials business of Honeywell International Inc. that the conglomerate is in the process of spinning off is set to raise $2 billion Tuesday in the junk-bond and leveraged-loan markets.】

item.title: 中美TikTok谈判取得进展，甲骨文股价攀升
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）股价上涨，原因是有消息称有关 TikTok 未来的谈判正在取得进展，从而缓解了该软件公司重要客户之一的不确定性。【原文：Oracle Corp. shares rose on news that negotiations over the future of TikTok are progressing, relieving some uncertainty around one of the software company’s key customers.】

item.title: 捷豹路虎网络攻击的影响波及供应商
item.description: 网络攻击导致捷豹路虎汽车公司（Jaguar Land Rover Automotive Plc）工厂停工，供应商也受到影响，一些欧洲零部件制造商被迫暂停或缩减自己的生产。【原文：The cyberattack that’s brought Jaguar Land Rover Automotive Plc factories to a standstill is affecting suppliers, with some European parts makers forced to pause or scale back their own production.】

item.title: 芝加哥预算领导者提出削减开支和提高收费以弥补赤字
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）的预算工作小组为他提供了数十种选择方案，其中包括休假、冻结招聘、增加费用以及与通胀挂钩的物业税上调等。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson’s budget working group has given him dozens of options — including furloughs, hiring freezes, fee increases and a property tax hike tied to inflation — to choose from as he works to close a $1.15 billion deficit for next year.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司正与芯片制造商合作开发 "星链 "蜂窝服务
item.description: SpaceX 公司正在与微芯片制造商合作，在手机中嵌入设备，以支持其新生的 Starlink 卫星对手机服务，这是该公司在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的公司斥资 170 亿美元从 EchoStar 公司收购无线频谱之后迈出的关键一步。【原文：SpaceX is working with microchip manufacturers to embed devices in phones to support its nascent Starlink satellite-to-cell service, a key step following the Elon Musk-led company’s $17 billion deal to acquire wireless spectrum from EchoStar Corp.】

item.title: 奥古斯塔国家赛新增亚马逊 Prime 频道转播 2026 年美国名人赛
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）旗下的 Prime Video 已成为首家与奥古斯塔国家高尔夫俱乐部（Augusta National Golf Club）达成协议的主要技术流媒体公司，将在 2026 年播出美国名人赛（Masters Tournament）的首轮比赛。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s Prime Video has become the first major tech streamer to strike a deal with Augusta National Golf Club, airing the early rounds of the Masters Tournament in 2026.】

item.title: 荷兰承诺加入北约后将国防开支增至 270 亿欧元
item.description: 荷兰明年将把国防预算提高到 270 亿欧元（320 亿美元），努力实现北约提出的到 2035 年将国内生产总值的 5%用于安全的新目标。【原文：The Netherlands will boost its defense budget next year to €27 billion ($32 billion), as the country works toward meeting NATO’s new goal of spending 5% of gross domestic product on security by 2035.】
